list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fixed or movable upright partition used to divide a room, give shelter from drafts, heat, or light, or to provide concealment or privacy.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a room with a red carpet and screens with oriental decorations
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một căn phòng có thảm đỏ và màn hình với đồ trang trí phương Đông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a flat panel or area on an electronic device such as a television, computer, or smartphone, on which images and data are displayed.
a transparent, finely ruled plate or film used in halftone reproduction.
a detachment of troops or ships detailed to cover the movements of the main body.
a large sieve or riddle, especially one for sorting substances such as grain or coal into different sizes.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the material retained on each sieve screen is weighed in turn
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: vật liệu được giữ lại trên mỗi màn hình rây được cân

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: conceal, protect, or shelter (someone or something) with a screen or something forming a screen.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her hair swung across to screen her face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tóc cô vung lên để sàng lọc khuôn mặt của cô

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: show (a movie or video) or broadcast (a television program).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the show is to be screened by HBO later this year
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chương trình sẽ được sàng lọc bởi HBO vào cuối năm nay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: test (a person or substance) for the presence or absence of a disease or contaminant.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: outpatients were screened for cervical cancer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bệnh nhân ngoại trú đã được sàng lọc ung thư cổ tử cung

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass (a substance such as grain or coal) through a large sieve or screen, especially so as to sort it into different sizes.
project (a photograph or other image) through a transparent ruled plate so as to be able to reproduce it as a halftone.
